name: DRIFT MAYHEM
description:
[ I was not able to upload the Web version of the game in time so would be awesome if you could download and rate my game ]

This is a very short action driving game where you control a car with an AI gun attached. You have to steer your way through the drones and complete the game with the least number of impacts.

Music By:

Music: Evan King - [Biscuits]
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCT1ZkP03V18LmOj8zbyP-Dw?
https://contextsensitive.bandcamp.com/
